data.name: Baron Zemo
data.description: Aristocrat and Hydra commander, Baron Zemo is fueled by contempt for the weak and deals extra damage to minions.

starItems.name: Baron Zemo
starItems.description: Aristocrat and Hydra commander, Baron Zemo is fueled by contempt for the weak and deals extra damage to minions.

1.description:
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a Hydra Grenadier ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target

2.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a Hydra Grenadier ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

3.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a Hydra Grenadier ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target

4.description:
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a Hydra Grenadier ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

5.description:
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a Hydra Grenadier ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade:
Always apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a Hydra Grenadier ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a Hydra Grenadier ally.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.

1.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. If primary target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing instead. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target

2.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. If primary target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing instead. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target

3.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. If primary target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing instead. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage. If primary target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing instead. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage. If primary target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>620%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing instead. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage. If primary target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>740%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing instead. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>160%</color> damage to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing to <color=#fff568>MINION</color> primary target

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage. If primary target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack for <color=#86e619>900%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing instead. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary and secondary targets
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and secondary targets
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack all non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage and all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Then clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from all enemies and lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed. Non-<color=#fff568>MINION HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on enemy <color=#fff568>MINION</color> turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self and all adjacent allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack all non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage and all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Then clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from all enemies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies, and lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed. Non-<color=#fff568>MINION HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on enemy <color=#fff568>MINION</color> turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>,to self and all adjacent allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all targets
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for self and all non-<color=#fff568>MINION HYDRA</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack all non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage and all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Then clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from all enemies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies, and lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed. Non-<color=#fff568>MINION HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on enemy <color=#fff568>MINION</color> turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>,to self and all adjacent allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack all non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage and all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Then clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from all enemies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies, and lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed. Non-<color=#fff568>MINION HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on enemy <color=#fff568>MINION</color> turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>,to self and all adjacent allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all targets
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from all enemies
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed for self and all non-<color=#fff568>MINION HYDRA</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack all non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage and all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage. Then clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from all enemies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>MINION</color> enemies, and lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. <color=#fff568>MINIONS</color> killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Speed. Non-<color=#fff568>MINION HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on enemy <color=#fff568>MINION</color> turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>,to self and all adjacent allies.
